gmd:keyword.gco:CharacterString: Objectively analyzed mean fields for sea_water_sigma at standard depth levels.
Average of all unflagged interpolated values at each standard depth level for sea_water_sigma in each grid-square which contain at least one measurement.
The number of observations of sea_water_sigma in each grid-square at each standard depth level.
The standard deviation about the statistical mean of sea_water_sigma in each grid-square at each standard depth level.
The number of grid-squares within the smallest radius of influence around each grid-square which contain a statistical mean for sea_water_sigma.

gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: These data are openly available to the public. Please acknowledge the use of these data with the text given in the acknowledgment attribute.

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Use liability: NOAA and NCEI cannot provide any warranty as to the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of furnished data. Users assume responsibility to determine the usability of these data. The user is responsible for the results of any application of this data for other than its intended purpose.

Distribution liability: NOAA and NCEI make no warranty, expressed or implied, regarding these data, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty. NOAA and NCEI cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in these data. If appropriate, NCEI can only certify that the data it distributes are an authentic copy of the records that were accepted for inclusion in the NCEI archives.

gmd:descriptor.gco:CharacterString: Objectively analyzed mean fields for sea_water_sigma at standard depth levels. (sea_water_sigma)
Average of all unflagged interpolated values at each standard depth level for sea_water_sigma in each grid-square which contain at least one measurement. (sea_water_sigma)
The number of observations of sea_water_sigma in each grid-square at each standard depth level. (sea_water_sigma number_of_observations)
The standard deviation about the statistical mean of sea_water_sigma in each grid-square at each standard depth level.
The number of grid-squares within the smallest radius of influence around each grid-square which contain a statistical mean for sea_water_sigma.
